name: Super Mech Bro Bros
description:
Lightning has struck! Appliances are now given life and a mind of their own! Your mech-destroyer must destroy the rogue appliances and maintain operational voltage while avoiding hazards.

Grab the tools to score and repair your damage by grabbing the toolbox and oil drums. Watch out for the bad water heater, it's moving fast!

Control your mech-bot with the right arrow key. Jump with the up arrow key. Space bar throws wrench at enemies.

Thanks to graphicsdojo.com for the mech-bro images!
